name: Wilfred, the Esteemed Wizard
attack_flv_texts: Wilfred dives his hand into his robe, preparing to fling powder at you.
Wilfred begins to chant a spell. He's about to attack.
Wilfred waves his hands sporadically. He's casting a rune.
Wilfred reveals a dark orb, his face terrible to behold.
defend_flv_texts: Wilfred summons a shield. He hides behind it.
idle_flv_texts: Wilfred grins smugly, all defenses recklessly abandoned.

name: Possesed Nutcracker
attack_flv_texts: Possesed Nutcracker prepares for a quick swipe of the sword.
Possesed Nutcracker steps back with sword back, ready to lunge.
Possesed Nutcracker mechanically stoops for a quick jump forward.
Possesed Nutcraker is ready to flurry! You see a glint in it's cold eyes.
defend_flv_texts: Possessed Nutcracker steps back and raises its sword in a defensive posture.
idle_flv_texts: Possessed Nutcracker cocks it's head quizzically - it seems confused.

name: Evil Chris
attack_flv_texts: Evil Chris is about to give a steely leer
Evil Chris is going to smack you!
Evil Chris is going to chomp, and he hasn't brushed!
Evil Chris is going to spew a series of profanities!
defend_flv_texts: Evil Chris hides behind his enormous, if unfounded, confidence
idle_flv_texts: Evil Chris is pondering your last quip.

name: Herbert the Derp Deer
attack_flv_texts: Herbert the derp deer is about to release a screechy whinny!
Herbert the derp deer thinks your face is an apple! No, Herbert!!
Herbert the derp deer is spins around, ready to kick!
Herbert is summoning a Cthulu Lord! Don't do it, Herbert!!
defend_flv_texts: Herbert lowers his head and reveals his tough antlers
idle_flv_texts: Herbert the derp deer looks around, tounge hanging out of his mouth.
